name.baseName: Aluminum electrolytic capacitor production ; separator paper ; separator paper slitting ; separator paper rolls
铝电解电容器生产 ; 分割纸 ; 分隔纸分切 ; 分离器纸卷

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 分隔纸分切 ; 铝电解电容器 (AEC) 生产 ; 420V 680uf

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The investigated manufacturer produced about 1.183 billion AECs of all kinds in 2020.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The production data described pertains to aluminum electrolytic capacitors (AECs) intended for usage in a variety of electronics that require stable and reliable energy storage, such as power supply filters and signal coupling. Specifically, the AECs produced use a 420V 680uf configuration, suitable for high-voltage applications. The separator paper is a critical component in AEC production, contributing to the capacitor's overall performance and durability.
本生产数据描述的是铝电解电容器（AEC），适用于需要稳定和可靠能量存储的各种电子产品，如电源滤波器和信号耦合装置。具体而言，所生产的AEC采用420V 680uf配置，适合高电压应用。分隔纸是AEC生产中的关键组件，对电容器的整体性能和耐久性起着至关重要的作用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data of capacitor production come from the AECs’ production factory in Jiangsu Province, China. The cut-off criteria of LCI data collection for each process is coverage of at least 95% of the mass and energy of the input and output flows. The inventory data of anode foil production and cathode foil production is obtained based on the analysis of the manufacturing processes and corresponding process parameters. The upstream data (i.e., aluminum ingots, separator paper, transport, electricity, and water) are acquired from the Gabi software (Version: 10.6.1.35). In detail, the profile of Chineses electricity grid from the China Electric Power Yearbook adopts the reference year 2016. The reference year of aluminum ingot production is 2015. The inaccessible data about ammonium citrate, ammonium pentaborate, NH4H2PO4, and HBO3 are estimated based on chemical equations using the existing materials (reactants) in the Gabi software. The use and end-of-life stage inventory data are obtained based on analysis and calculation.

电容器生产的库存数据来自 AEC 位于中国江苏省的生产工厂。每道工序的 LCI 数据收集的截止标准是至少覆盖输入流和输出流 95% 的质量和能量。阳极箔生产和阴极箔生产的库存数据是根据生产工艺和相应工艺参数分析获得的。上游数据（即铝锭、分选纸、运输、电力和水）来自 Gabi 软件（版本：10.6.1.35）。具体而言，《中国电力年鉴》中的中国电网概况以 2016 年为基准年。铝锭生产的基准年为 2015 年。无法获取的柠檬酸铵、五硼酸铵、NH4H2PO4 和 HBO3 数据是根据 Gabi 软件中现有材料（反应物）的化学方程式估算的。使用和报废阶段的库存数据是通过分析和计算获得的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).
Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This set of data should be employed with the context that it reflects the conditions and technologies of aluminum electrolytic capacitor production within a Chinese manufacturing context as of the reference years 2015 for aluminum ingot production, and 2016 for the Chinese electricity grid. Users should update the data on aluminum ingots and electricity if newer or region-specific data is available. The cut-off criteria for Life Cycle Inventory (LCI) data collection signifies at least 95% mass and energy coverage of input and output flows. Users modeling the production should account for this threshold in their assessment. Certain data have been estimated through chemical equations and should be verified with actual industrial data when available. Use phase and end-of-life stage data should also be incorporated into LCA models as per specific application and regulatory requirements.

此数据集应在反映中国生产环境和技术条件的背景下使用，铝锭生产的参考年份为2015年，中国电网的参考年份为2016年。用户如有更新或特定地区的数据，应更新铝锭和用电数据。生命周期清单（LCI）数据收集的割裂标准意味着至少95％的质量和能量输入输出流覆盖率。用户在建模生产时，应该考虑到这个门槛。某些数据是通过化学方程式估算得出的，一旦有实际工业数据可用时应进行核实。使用阶段和生命周期末端数据也应根据具体应用和法规要求，纳入LCA模型中。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
